articles.description:

Been an avid reader of http://avc.com by @fredwilson but always found it tough whenever I'm on the move or offline
So I put together some scripts to let me download over 9000 blogs in PDF, CSV, MOBI and EPUB
Dive in or download or contribute 🤠

articles.description:
Pin a file to IPFS in 2 minutes with @fleekxyz 🔥 https://twitter.com/abruzuc/status/1650577892026490880

This means that when using @BrumeWallet, every single wallet address can use a different IP address

Just like Ethereum is a protocol and Uniswap, MetaMask, and OpenSea are apps to interact with it, Star Wars, Lord of the Rings, MARVEL, and all other universes are protocols as well. 
And movies, books, and games are apps to interact with these worlds.
